My wife and I have $7,000 a month in pensions and Social Security, plus $140,000 cash. Can we afford to retire?. “My wife of 20 years is a Japanese national and lives in the U.S. as a permanent resident.”
‘He doesn’t seem to care’: My secretive father, 81, added my name to a bank account. What about my mom?. “Neither my mom nor I know anything about their finances.”
